issue.title: [CF 600] Reordering of groups...
issue.body:
Wondering is the ability to re-order groups would be hard to add.  I want to reorder them more cleanly for my own sanity and for exporting.  Am I missing something obvious?  (Exporting/importing will break the linkages.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Stanoslav | Imported from CurseForge issue #600 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in r594


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just tested ... moved all my groups around ... works perfectly. Big quality of life improvement ... thanks! Stanoslav


> Posted by CurseForge user Stanoslav
